attributes.action: give financial support to savers during this enconomic crisis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The latest bank base rate cut has been catastrophic for savers especially those who rely on savings interest to supplement their pensions.
The Government do not appear to want to help savers. The Government should help all its people particularly during this financial crisis, not just some of them.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
